Hi Travis thank you for replying, 

Hmm how sad that nothing like that has =
come up yet, I did what you suggested but heritrix is not crawling anything=
 like that is  giving
me a "Heritrix(-9998)-Robots precluded / Failed to cr=
awl" is
there a good way to do this, or should I just ignore robots.txt
whi=
ch seems to be a very bad idea... 



--- In archive-crawler@...=
m, Travis Wellman  wrote:
>
> To start with a keyword you'd need to also st=
art with an index that would translate that keyword into urls. There's no a=
uthoratative index, and no such mechanism (that I know of) has been created=
, but you could seed with a few urls like this:
> 
> http://www.reddit.com/=
search.xml?q=3Dkeyword
> https://duckduckgo.com/html/?q=3Dkeyword
> 
> 
>

>
